## IFrameChannelProvider class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Class for interacting with a statechannels wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class IFrameChannelProvider implements IFrameChannelProviderInterface 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IFrameChannelProviderInterface](./iframe-channel-provider.iframechannelproviderinterface.md)
